DOC.brief_summary: The tumor cause oncogenic osteomalacia ( TIO ) express release circulation phosphaturic factor fibroblast growth factor-23 ( FGF-23 ) decrease renal phosphate absorption act proximal renal tubule decrease Type 2a 2c sodium-phosphate co-transporter . They typically follow benign clinical course even rare malignant case , local recurrence occur less 5 % distant metastasis uncommon . In study aim investigate role molecular pathway ERK1 , ERK2 , mTOR , EGFR , MEK1 , MEK2 , VEGFR3 , AKT1 , AKT2 , IGFR-1 , IGFR-2 , PDGFRA , PDGFRB , cMET , FGFR2 , apart FGF23 , KLOTHO PHEX , behavior histopathologically benign mesenchymal phosphaturic tumor .
DOC.brief_title: Molecular Pathways Involved Pathogenesis Behavior Mesenchymal Phosphaturic Tumors Causing Oncogenic Osteomalacia
DOC.detailed_description: Study Protocol Cell Culture Bone marrow tissue sample obtain patient give write informed consent . Material maintain RPMI culture medium ( Sigma , R0883 , Germany ) . Peripheral blood mononuclear cell ( PBMCs ) healthy donor use control . For detection cancer cell sample perform flow cytometry use EpCAM magnetic bead ( 39-EPC-50 ; Gentaur ) , negative selection cell ( non-cancerous ) isolate cultured 25-cm2 flask ( 5520100 ; Orange Scientific ) RPMI-1640 medium ( R6504 ; Sigma ) . Molecular analysis RNA extract cell culture use RNeasy Mini Kit ( 74105 ; Qiagen , Hilden ; Germany ) . iScript cDNA synthesis kit ( 1708891 ; Bio-Rad , CA ; USA ) , use cDNA synthesis Real-time polymerase chain reaction ( PCR ) , perform use iTaq Universal SYBR Green Supermix ( 1725124 ; Bio-Rad ) . Specific primer marker endogenous control gene ( 18S rRNA ) design use Genamic Expression 1.1 software . A universal Reference RNA consist 10 human cancer cell line ( 740000-41 ; Agilent ) well human genomic DNA ( G304A ; Promega ) use quantitative PCR ( qPCR ) reaction Statistical analysis The qPCR result test accord Kolmogorov-Smirnov test ; All reaction ( molecular assay , flow cytometry ) perform triplicate . A p value < 0.05 consider significant .
